π
===
> The mathematical constant [π][pi].


<!-- <usage> -->
## Usage

``` javascript
var PI = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-pi' );
```

#### PI

The mathematical constant [π][pi].

``` javascript
PI === 3.141592653589793;
```
<!-- </usage> -->


<!-- <examples> -->
## Examples

``` javascript
var PI = require( '@stdlib/math/constants/float64-pi' );

console.log( PI );
// returns 3.141592653589793
```
<!-- </examples> -->

[pi]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pi
